org.mini2Dx.core.controller.xboxone

Class MacXboxOneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.controller.XboxOneController
      • org.mini2Dx.core.controller.xboxone.MacXboxOneController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerListener, MdxController<XboxOneControllerListener>

    public class MacXboxOneController
extends XboxOneController
    Mac OS X bindings for Xbox One controller
